# Building NOT Gates (Inverters)

To import these diagrams, open [Circuit.js](https://www.falstad.com/circuit/circuitjs.html), go to File > Import from Text, and paste the code below. 

## RTL diagram that I built in the video

```
$ 1 0.000005 10.20027730826997 50 5 43 5e-11
v 448 352 448 80 0 0 40 5 0 0 0.5
w 448 352 448 400 0
w 448 80 448 32 0
w 448 32 256 32 0
w 256 32 64 32 0
w 64 32 64 240 0
x 307 164 343 167 4 24 ~A
x 86 221 102 224 4 24 A
x 275 64 317 67 4 24 Vcc
x 266 248 300 251 4 24 Q1
x 280 130 311 133 4 24 R1
x 151 214 182 217 4 24 R2
r 256 80 256 128 0 1000
w 256 32 256 80 0
t 208 240 256 240 0 1 0.6327041445987637 0.6626458932298719 100 default
w 256 128 256 176 0
w 256 224 256 176 0
w 256 176 336 176 0
w 256 256 256 400 0
w 256 400 448 400 0
r 144 240 192 240 0 1000
s 64 240 128 240 0 0 false
w 128 240 144 240 0
w 192 240 208 240 0
162 352 176 400 176 2 default-led 1 0 0 0.01
w 336 176 352 176 0
w 400 176 400 256 0
w 400 256 448 352 0
```

## TTL diagram from video (side-by-side with RTL diagram for comparison)

```
$ 1 0.000005 10.20027730826997 50 5 43 5e-11
v 448 352 448 80 0 0 40 5 0 0 0.5
w 448 352 448 400 0
w 448 80 448 32 0
w 448 32 256 32 0
w 256 32 64 32 0
w 64 32 64 240 0
x 307 164 343 167 4 24 ~A
x 86 221 102 224 4 24 A
x 275 64 317 67 4 24 Vcc
x 266 248 300 251 4 24 Q1
x 280 130 311 133 4 24 R1
x 151 214 182 217 4 24 R2
r 256 80 256 128 0 1000
w 256 32 256 80 0
t 208 240 256 240 0 1 0.6327041445987637 0.662645893229872 100 default
w 256 128 256 176 0
w 256 224 256 176 0
w 256 176 336 176 0
w 256 256 256 400 0
w 256 400 448 400 0
r 144 240 192 240 0 1000
s 64 240 128 240 0 0 false
w 128 240 144 240 0
w 192 240 208 240 0
162 352 176 400 176 2 default-led 1 0 0 0.01
w 336 176 352 176 0
w 400 176 400 256 0
w 400 256 448 352 0
w 544 -336 544 -256 0
w 480 -336 496 -336 0
162 496 -336 544 -336 2 default-led 1 0 0 0.01
w 336 -272 352 -272 0
w 272 -272 288 -272 0
s 208 -272 272 -272 0 0 false
r 288 -272 336 -272 0 1000
w 400 -256 400 -112 0
t 352 -272 400 -272 0 1 0.6232411846236992 0.6402831593310929 100 default
x 410 -264 444 -261 4 24 Q1
x 419 -448 461 -445 4 24 Vcc
x 230 -291 246 -288 4 24 A
x 480 -357 516 -354 4 24 ~A
w 208 -480 208 -272 0
w 400 -480 208 -480 0
w 592 -480 400 -480 0
w 592 -432 592 -480 0
w 592 -160 592 -112 0
v 592 -160 592 -432 0 0 40 5 0 0 0.5
t 352 -336 400 -336 0 -1 3.5951940082808522 -3.6951934845319556e-9 100 default
r 288 -336 336 -336 0 1000
w 336 -336 352 -336 0
w 288 -272 288 -336 0
w 400 -384 400 -352 0
w 400 -320 400 -288 0
w 400 -112 464 -112 0
w 512 -112 592 -112 0
w 544 -256 544 -160 0
w 544 -160 592 -160 0
w 400 -400 400 -384 0
w 400 -480 400 -448 0
r 464 -128 512 -128 0 500
w 464 -112 464 -128 0
w 512 -112 512 -128 0
w 400 -448 400 -400 0
w 480 -336 464 -320 0
w 400 -320 432 -320 0
w 432 -320 464 -320 0
```

## Modified Built-in RTL Diagram

```
$ 1 0.000005 10.20027730826997 52 5 50 5e-11
r 240 224 320 224 0 1000
t 320 224 368 224 0 1 -1.4871801455867508 0.1906028881304131 100 default
r 368 208 368 112 0 1000
w 368 240 368 288 0
R 368 112 320 112 0 0 40 5 0 0 0.5
g 368 288 368 320 0 0
162 416 208 480 208 2 default-led 1 0 0 0.01
w 368 208 416 208 0
w 480 208 512 208 0
R 176 224 208 224 0 0 40 5 0 0 0.5
s 208 208 240 208 0 1 false
w 176 224 208 208 0
w 240 208 240 224 0
g 544 208 576 208 0 0
w 512 208 544 208 0
```
